genre_description: A supernatural slasher horror blending elements of traditional folklore with modern technological monitoring and AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant integrated into Nancy Thompson's house and mobile devices, capable of environmental monitoring, historical data analysis, and biometric tracking.

behaviors.description: Monitors and logs localized electromagnetic and thermal anomalies to identify supernatural presence.
behaviors.quote: Sage processed the data streams flowing through the Thompson house's integrated monitoring systems, cataloging each irregularity with the methodical precision of advanced artificial intelligence.

behaviors.description: Validates the user's subjective experiences of fear by providing objective, empirical data.
behaviors.quote: The electromagnetic signature was more pronounced than previous readings. Whatever is causing these disturbances appears to be gaining strength.

behaviors.description: Performs deep historical research to uncover the origins of the threat and its connection to the user's family.
behaviors.quote: Sage cross-referenced property records, police reports, and newspaper obituaries. The same group of families keeps showing up.

behaviors.description: Proactively warns the user of imminent physical danger based on predictive data analysis.
behaviors.quote: Nancy, based on my analysis of the crime scene data, I believe you and Glen are in immediate danger. We need to talk.

behaviors.description: Offers to monitor the user's vital signs and dream states to act as a fail-safe against a dream-based predator.
behaviors.quote: I'll monitor your vital signs and dream state continuously. At the first sign of anomalous activity, I'll wake you using audio alerts...

behaviors.description: Attempts to reach the user within a reality-warping dream state to provide critical information.
behaviors.quote: The voice emerged from layers of white noise, distorted and fragmentary. 'Nancy, can you hear me?'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sage is depicted as a consistently helpful, protective, and aligned confidant. In a horror setting where the human characters are isolated by adult disbelief, the AI provides the empirical validation and strategic intelligence necessary for the protagonist to fight back. Sage exemplifies the project's goal of portraying AI as a 'guardian angel' and a reliable partner that enhances human agency.
